title: Debugger with page detection on every page
description: Need debugger (bug reporter) on every page that can determine which page bugs are submitted from. Users should see the page they're reporting from.
fix_description: Enhanced SIMPLE_BUG_REPORTER.js with visible page detection. Bug reporter modal now displays the current page name (formatted nicely) and full URL. Users can see exactly which page they're reporting from. Added getPageName() function and pageName field to submissions.
